sbol:ComponentDefinition.dcterms:description: Can be used to generate AAV virus that will express the ChR2(H134R)-EYFP channelrhodopsin fusion protein in neurons under intersectional control by Flp and Cre recombinases.

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: lox71
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: lox71
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: Left element (LE) mutant of loxP (Araki et al., 2010). Cre-mediated recombination occurs in the 8-bp core sequence (GCATACAT).

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: blue light-activated cation channel

sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:modificationsToBackbone: A fragment containing: the hSyn1 promoter-a (Frt-Stop-Frt) cassette-a FLEX cassette with Lox71/LoxJTZ17 sites flanking (ChR2H134R-EYFP)-WPRE-bGHpA were swapped in to replace the CMV promoter-MCS-hGHpA sequence. Total insert size including the two ITRs is 4443 bp.
